requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: I5 6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It'll prolly run on a potato but if you have any issues let me know
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
